legal_basis: Rule 151 of the Federal Court Rules
decision_reasoning: potential innovators could be affected, requiring their inclusion
procedure_followed: Prothonotary Milczynski adjourned the motion due to insufficient notice
application_details: Apotex sought a protective order to withhold drug details, claiming competitive harm
relevant_rule: confidentiality orders if necessary to prevent serious risk and if salutary effects outweigh deleterious ones
